name: KnockedDown - Alpha
description: "KnockedDown" is an exciting low poly racing game where you play as a cop tasked with taking down notorious criminals. Navigate through a cityscape filled with obstacles as you chase down your targets. Utilize your police vehicle's high speed and agility to outmaneuver the perpetrators and bring them to justice. Outwit and outplay your opponents as you race through city streets, alleyways, and even construction sites. Experience intense action and non-stop thrills as you bring the criminals of the city to justice in "KnockedDown."
